body_html:
Yeah, that was it. Now it works fine. Thanks @vishwakftw and @soumith.
@soumith, you mentioned that

conda changed cudatoolkit from 9.0 to 9.2 3 days ago.

What does that have to do with a machine that may not have Cuda at all?
For me it was working on some machine and on others not. Both share the same $HOME and installation folders.
body_text:
Yeah, that was it. Now it works fine. Thanks @vishwakftw and @soumith.
@soumith, you mentioned that

conda changed cudatoolkit from 9.0 to 9.2 3 days ago.

What does that have to do with a machine that may not have Cuda at all?
For me it was working on some machine and on others not. Both share the same $HOME and installation folders.
body:
Yeah, that was it. Now it works fine. Thanks @vishwakftw and @soumith.
@soumith, you mentioned that

> `conda` changed cudatoolkit from `9.0` to `9.2` 3 days ago.

What does that have to do with a machine that may not have Cuda at all?
For me it was working on some machine and on others not. Both share the same `$HOME` and *installation* folders.
